dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Dwayne Johnson making almost ninety million dollars in a single year... is that just pure star power, or is there a new financial playbook for actors now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Dwayne Johnson making almost ninety million dollars in a single year... is that just pure star power, or is there a new financial playbook for actors now?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Dwayne Johnson, also known as the Rock, tops the Forbes list of the worlds ten highest-paid actors, collecting $89.4 million between June 1, 2018, and June 1, 2019.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, it's definitely a playbook. I mean, he's getting twenty-three million upfront for Jumanji, plus a huge cut of the backend.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, it's definitely a playbook. I mean, he's getting twenty-three million upfront for Jumanji, plus a huge cut of the backend.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Hell collect an upfront salary of up to $23.5 millionhis highest quote yetfor the forthcoming Jumanji: The Next Level. He also commands up to 15% of the pool from high-grossing franchise movies, including Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle, which had a worldwide box office of $962.1 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and that fifteen percent of the pool from high-grossing franchises is no joke—Jumanji made almost a billion dollars worldwide, so that's a massive chunk of change.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and that fifteen percent of the pool from high-grossing franchises is no joke-Jumanji made almost a billion dollars worldwide, so that's a massive chunk of change.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He also commands up to 15% of the pool from high-grossing franchise movies, including Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle, which had a worldwide box office of $962.1 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And it's not just him, right? Robert Downey Jr. got over fifty million just from Avengers: Endgame alone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's not just him, right? Robert Downey Jr. got over fifty million just from Avengers: Endgame alone.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Robert Downey Jr. gets $20 million upfront and nearly 8% of the pool for his role as Iron Man, and that amounted to about $55 million for his work in Avengers: Endgame, which grossed $2.796 billion at the box office.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! That movie made almost three billion, so even a smaller percentage like his eight and a half percent still adds up to a fortune.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! That movie made almost three billion, so even a smaller percentage like his eight and a half percent still adds up to a fortune.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Robert Downey Jr. gets $20 million upfront and nearly 8% of the pool for his role as Iron Man, and that amounted to about $55 million for his work in Avengers: Endgame, which grossed $2.796 billion at the box office.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But then you've got someone like Bradley Cooper, who took a huge risk on A Star Is Born—he gave up his upfront salary entirely.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then you've got someone like Bradley Cooper, who took a huge risk on A Star Is Born-he gave up his upfront salary entirely.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The movie was a passion project for Cooper, and he forfeited any upfront salary to go into the film and Gagas salary.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and that bet paid off big time. He walked away with an estimated forty million from a film that only cost thirty-six to make.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and that bet paid off big time. He walked away with an estimated forty million from a film that only cost thirty-six to make.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It paid offthe movie, which had a production budget of only $36 million, grossed $435 million worldwide, leaving Cooper with an estimated $40 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's fascinating how the top earners are really split between these massive franchise payouts from superhero movies and these passion projects that just explode.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's fascinating how the top earners are really split between these massive franchise payouts from superhero movies and these passion projects that just explode.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the leverage these stars have now... Scarlett Johansson, Downey—studios basically have to meet their demands for these tentpole films.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the leverage these stars have now... Scarlett Johansson, Downey-studios basically have to meet their demands for these tentpole films.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Celebrities such as Downey and (Scarlett) Johansson currently have extreme leverage to demand enormous compensation packages from studios investing hundreds of millions of dollars in making tent-pole films, such as The Avengers series, entertainment lawyer David Chidekel of Early Sullivan Wright Gizer & McRae told Forbes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's wild that the top ten list is so dominated by franchise players. Like, Paul Rudd and Chris Evans are on there purely from Marvel money.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's wild that the top ten list is so dominated by franchise players. Like, Paul Rudd and Chris Evans are on there purely from Marvel money.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: That gross was so big that it secured spots on this years top-earner list for Chris Hemsworth, Bradley Cooper and Paul Rudd, in addition to Downey; together, they earned $284 million, with most of that coming from the franchise.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Even Will Smith at number ten with thirty-five million seems almost modest compared to Johnson's nearly ninety.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Even Will Smith at number ten with thirty-five million seems almost modest compared to Johnson's nearly ninety.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But you know what's interesting? Johnson's also making seven figures from his Under Armour line—it's not just about the movies anymore.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But you know what's interesting? Johnson's also making seven figures from his Under Armour line-it's not just about the movies anymore.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: And he is paid $700,000 per episode for HBOs Ballers and seven figures in royalties for his line of clothing, shoes and headphones with Under Armour.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: True, the diversification is key. Endorsements, producing... it's a whole business empire.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True, the diversification is key. Endorsements, producing... it's a whole business empire.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Still, eighty-nine point four million in under a year... that's just staggering no matter how you slice it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, eighty-nine point four million in under a year... that's just staggering no matter how you slice it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Dwayne Johnson, also known as the Rock, tops the Forbes list of the worlds ten highest-paid actors, collecting $89.4 million between June 1, 2018, and June 1, 2019.
